entry.title: some problems about setting a blog
entry.content: some problems setting a blog based on HexoTags: solutions The importance of wherre to gitbash or run powershelle.g. updating the theme---*next*, gitbash in the file of * next * Carefully read the errors instead of being furious1. since bug information will show the specific location of errors, which could provide a fantanstic opportunity to examine the programme. 2.many mistakes are quite easily neglected e.g. ** ERROR Theme config load failed ** ** ERROR Process failed: _config.yml ** These above are all caused by imitating others' methods completely. (I even did not change the "your URL" to "8972LEE")

entry.title: The first day using my blog
entry.content: The first day using my blog Micro-diary â€”terrible but wonderful at last Although some people claim that it only takes almost 5 minites to set up a unique blog, for me, almost 2 hour to complete this simplified blog. English is really important when lots of techniques and methods in English needed to be understood. In the future,I need to study the markdown style and some knowedge about github. Important, be familiar with cmd, oders. Do not be stupid!!!
